Articles.Content: When 0.23.5 first came out I was beyond excitement. And then I opened the game. I opened the saved craft file to see if NASA's SLS was already built for me, but sadly was left to do it myself. I really hope someone sees this and designs an SLS with the stock 0.23.5 parts. Keep up the great work.

What's stopping you from doing it yourself?

This is a game about BUILDING rockets
